item.title: New: How to make NPC's unaggresive?
item.dc:creator: @Nubz Nubz
item.description:
@Nubz wrote:

Well open NPCHandler.java and if your kbd is agressive search up

case 50:

Can’t look at the NPCHandler on my computer atm because I’m at my friends. If you’re having trouble pm me tomorrow around 10pm your time and I’ll help you.
Case 50 is KBD, you have to find the npc ID for green dragons and delete it from there.

Read full topic

item.title: New: How to make NPC's unaggresive?
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

ok is it a 317 or a 508?

[off-topic]-
They should make it a rule that when you posting a server or need help you need to post the type of server.

If its a 508 its easy you go to your npc file then click the npc.txt
Find the line of txt.

public int[] agressionNpcs = {

Than find the npc 941 and delete it from the list.

If its a 317 server i forget sorry,

Read full topic
